PDC World Darts ChampionshipIndex 0: In the 2009 PDC World Darts Championship, Raymond van Barneveld won in the Quarter-Final round against Jelle Klaasen.
PDC World Darts ChampionshipIndex 1: The second record features Adrian Lewis who competed against Gary Anderson in the final round of the 2011 PDC World Darts Championship and won.
PDC World Darts ChampionshipIndex 3: In the 2013 PDC World Darts Championship, Dean Winstanley lost in the 2nd Round to Vincent van der Voort.
PDC World Darts ChampionshipIndex 4: In the 2013 PDC World Darts Championship, Michael van Gerwen won in the Semi Final round against James Wade.
PDC World Darts ChampionshipIndex 5: In the 2014 PDC World Darts Championship, Terry Jenkins lost in the 1st Round to Per Laursen.
PDC World Darts ChampionshipIndex 2: The sixth record features Kyle Anderson who played against Ian White in the first round of the 2014 PDC World Darts Championship and lost.
